page.title: 13Fast Food
page.content: Fast food outlets are one of Scarborough's rapid growth industries with several new enterprises opening, and less successful ones closing, each year.{The South Bay}and lower part of the town has seen the greatest development during recent years and visitors are able to purchase a wide variety of foods including ice cream, candyfloss, burgers, hot dogs, pizzas, kebabs, waffles, baked potatoes and, of course,{fish and chips}which still remain the most popular. Fast{pizza restaurants have been a popular development and recently a large{fish and{chip}restaurant has opened in the middle of town. Many{pubs}have jumped on the fast food bandwagon and are offering very reasonably priced bar snacks and meals often with a {children's menu}to attract families.
